ComicInfo.Summary:
Anniversary issue celebrating 15 years of Judge Dredd (1977-1992).
The cover is made up of 16 images of Dredd by 16 different artists (from left to right, starting at the top row - Carlos Ezquerra, Mike McMahon, Ian Gibson, Brian Bolland (inked by Dave Gibbons), Ron Smith, Brian Bolland, Brett Ewins, Steve Dillon, Cam Kennedy, Cliff Robinson, Brendan McCarthy, John Higgins, Jim Baikie, Colin Macneil, Will Simpson, Carlos Ezquerra).
Only three ongoing stories this issue (The Straightjacket Fits, Brit-Cit Babes and McNulty), the rest are all one-offs.
Cover: Dredd through the ages
Judge Dredd - The Hand of Fate (Alan Grant - Charlie Adlard)The Straightjacket Fits (part 13) (David Bishop - Roger Langridge)Brit-Cit Babes (part 3) (John Wagner - Steve Sampson)Middenface McNulty - Wan Man an' Hus Dug (part 4) (Alan Grant and Tony Luke - John McCrea)Judge Edwina's Strange Cases - Monsters (Dave Stone - Nick Percival)Heavy Metal Dredd - The Man Who Killed Judge Dredd (John Wagner and Alan Grant - Colin Macneil)
